title: Exclusive: iPad Air 16GB or 32GB B Grade from £119.99!
content:
Easy to use, wonderfully handy and conveniently portable, iPads are the perfect way to access apps, check your emails, stream TV, visit websites and much more – and with this exclusive deal, you can get one at a brilliant price. All you need to do is choose between an iPad Air 16GB at just £119.99 (usual price £124.99) or an iPad Air 32GB at £134.99 (usual price £144.99). Available in Space Grey or Silver, both are Grade B listed refurbished models, and come with an exclusive 12-month warranty for extra peace of mind. What’s more, they’ll be delivered direct to your door for free via Royal Mail Tracked & Signed Next Day!

Get your iPad

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

Established in 2015, IncTablet is based in Dublin, Ireland, with five UK sites. The company specialises in quality, recycled Apple products at affordable prices, and whether you go for its refurbished 16GB iPad Air or 32GB iPad Air, a USB charging cable and a brown generic box will be included (you’ll only receive an Apple box if one is available).

The iPad Air 16GB features:

  • A 9.7-inch retina display, an A7 chip with 64-bit architecture, ultrafast wireless, powerful apps, fingerprint scanner, and up to 10 hours of battery life. Plus, 475,000 apps in the App Store are just a tap away.
  • WiFi only
  • iOS Software 12.5.1
  • This is a refurbed product; B Grade – Good
  • Good condition. This is a used product that will show moderate signs of wear across the device. This item is in full working order and has been fully tested.

The iPad 32GB features:

  • A 9.7-inch retina display, an A7 chip with 64-bit architecture, ultrafast wireless, powerful apps, fingerprint scanner, and up to 10 hours of battery life. Plus, 475,000 apps in the App Store are just a tap away.
  • WiFi only
  • iOS Software 12.5.1
  • One year warranty
  • This is a refurbed product; B Grade – Good
  • Good condition. This is a used product that will show moderate signs of wear across the device. This item is in full working order and has been fully tested.

Get your iPad

Offer ends 19/10/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.

author: Steve Newell
